title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s official repo: CLI & server for running Llama-2, Mistral, Gemma, etc. locally with one command.

title: ollama-python
summary: First-party Python client & async helpers for the Ollama API; on PyPI as ‘ollama’.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; on npm as ‘ollama’.

title: langchain-community/llms/ollama
summary: LangChain integration letting you swap in any Ollama model as an LLM or chat backend.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI (React/Flask) that talks to the local Ollama server; clone of ChatGPT UI.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with synchronous, async and reactive APIs; published to Maven Central.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based TUI that wraps ollama with keyboard-driven chat history and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into an inline coding assistant à la GitHub Copilot.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Minimal Electron chat shell around Ollama; one-click installers for Mac/Win/Linux.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Simple CLI tool that ingests PDFs/txt and does RAG using Ollama + Sentence-Transformers.

title: ollama-node
summary: Zero-dependency Node.js wrapper around the Ollama REST API with full TypeScript coverage.

title: ollama-py
summary: Lightweight community Python client (alternative to official one) with Pydantic models.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama supporting .NET 6+ with async enumerables for streaming tokens.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models via slash commands.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama server and models on Kubernetes with GPU node selection.

title: ollama-model-hub
summary: Community registry of custom Modelfiles and quantized GGUFs ready for ‘ollama pull’.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing typed async bindings to the Ollama API with tokio & serde.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat app template that connects to Ollama with session memory and model picker.

title: ollama-go
summary: Idiomatic Go client for Ollama with context cancellation and SSE streaming support.
